name: 灯織
text: 真乃、レッスンお疲れ
trans: Mano, good job on your lesson.

name: 真乃
text:
お疲れ様……
あ、あの……灯織ちゃん？
trans:
Thank you...
Ah, umm... Hiori?

name: 灯織
text: ん、どうしたの？
trans: Yes? What is it?

name: 真乃
text:
プロデューサーさんに聞いたよ
今度、同じ日にお休み取れたって
trans:
I heard from the Producer that
we have the same day off this week.

name: 真乃
text: これでピクニック一緒に行けるね
trans: We could go and have our picnic together.

name: 灯織
text: うん、そうだね……
trans: Yes, I don't mind.

name: 真乃
text: ……えっと、その
trans: Well... about that..

name: 真乃
text:
（無理矢理誘っちゃったけど、
本当は行きたくないのかな……）
trans:
(Even though I already invited her, 
I just can't help but feel like she really doesn't wanna go...)

name: 真乃
text:
（どうしよう……何か言わなくっちゃ……
こういう時、頭の中がまっしろになっちゃう……）
trans: (What can I do... should I say something at times like these? My mind just goes blank whenever this happens...)

name: 灯織
text: そうだ、真乃
trans: Yes, Mano.

name: 真乃
text: ……！　ど、どうしたの？
trans: Ah! Is there something wrong?

name: 灯織
text:
ここに来るとき、通りかかった図書館で
本を借りてきたの
trans:
I picked up a book from the library
for when we go on our picnic.

name: 灯織
text: この本なんだけど、見る？
trans: What's about this book?

name: 真乃
text: （お出かけ楽しいピクニック特集……？）
trans: (How to make a picnic fun...?)

name: 真乃
text: これを、灯織ちゃんが……？
trans: You picked this out?

name: 灯織
text: ……そんなに変かな？
trans: Was it weird to?

name: 真乃
text:
ううんううん！
全然、変じゃないよっ
trans:
No-no!
Not weird at all!

name: 灯織
text:
一緒に行こうって言ってくれたから
……要らなかった？
trans:
I got it because you asked me to go with you.
...Do we not need it?

name: 真乃
text:
ううん、そんなことないよ
一緒に見よう？
trans:
You don't need to worry about it,
let's just read it together!

name: 真乃
text:
（ほわぁ、灯織ちゃんがピクニックの本を
借りてきてくれるなんてっ）
trans:
(Howa... she went out and got a book for us
to read during our picnic?)

name: 真乃
text:
（メンバーとしてだけじゃなく、
距離が近づいたみたい……うれしいなっ）
trans: (We're not just fellow members, but, the distance between us is becoming closer... I'm happy about that.)

name: 真乃
text:
あ、見て見て灯織ちゃん
この公園はね、鳥さんたちがたくさんいるんだよ
trans:
Ah, look over here! Hiori!
This park has many different birds around!

name: 灯織
text:
へぇ、そうだったんだ
知らなかった……
trans:
Really? Looks like it.
I had no idea about that...

name: 真乃
text:
あと、こっちの公園は、噴水もあって
お花もたくさん咲いてるんだよ
trans:
And also, this park has a water fountain, 
and many flowers that are still blooming this season.

name: 真乃
text: それでこっちの公園はね──
trans: Oh and about this park...

name: 灯織
text: ふふ、やっぱり真乃、公園には詳しいんだね
trans: Haha, you sure do know a lot about parks, don't you?

name: 真乃
text:
うんっこの雑誌に載ってる所は
ほとんど行ったことがあると思うよ
trans:
Yes! I've gone to quite a lot of these places
mentioned in this book!

name: 灯織
text:
そうなの？
じゃあ、おすすめのところもあったりする？
trans:
Really?
Is there a park that you would recommend going to?

name: 真乃
text:
もちろんあるよ
そこにはよく、お散歩に行くのっ
trans:
Of course! 
There's a park I always love to take walks in.

name: 灯織
text:
じゃあ、そこにしようよ
真乃の好きな公園に行ってみたいから
trans:
Then, let's go there.
I really would like to see your favorite place.

name: 真乃
text: いいの……？
trans: Is that okay...?

name: 灯織
text: うん、そこがいい
trans: Yes, it'll be nice.

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんが、私の好きなところに
行ってみたいって……ほわぁ～うれしいな）
trans:
(She wants to go and see my favorite park...
Ah, I'm so happy about that...)

name: 灯織
text:
そういえば、真乃、
お弁当作って来るんだっけ？
trans:
Also, Mano,
Should we bring our bentos?

name: 真乃
text:
作るよっ
灯織ちゃんの分も作るからね
trans:
I'll make it instead,
And I could make some more for your portion too.

name: 灯織
text:
いや、私もお弁当作ろうかな……
って思って
trans:
No, well... I guess I thought it
would be nice if I can make them instead.

name: 灯織
text:
だから、ふたりともお弁当作って来るってことで
……いいでしょ？
trans:
Would that be okay,
if we both made bentos to bring along?

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ
わかったよ
trans:
Yes,
It's for the better.

name: 灯織
text: なんか、いつもよりずいぶん楽しそうね？
trans: You seem pretty excited about this, Mano.

name: 真乃
text:
そうかな。
ふふ、ピクニックが楽しみだからかな～
trans:
I guess so,
Hehe, it's probably because picnics are just so nice.

name: 灯織
text: ……私も楽しみにしてるから
trans: ...I'm also quite excited about that too.

name: 真乃
text:
本当に？
ほわぁ～、うれしい～
trans:
Really?
I'm glad.

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんもお弁当作ってきてくれるんだ……
それに楽しみって……）
trans:
(She'll also be making a bento...
I'm excited to see hers.)

name: 真乃
text: （早く次のお休み来ないかなぁ……）
trans: It would've been nice if our day would've hurried up...)
